title: Top Places to visit in Sangrur, Punjab
content: Sangrur district is in the state of Punjab in northern India. Sangrur consists of the cities of Dhuri, Lehragaga, Malerkotla, Sangrur, and Sunam. title: Top Places to visit in Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar, Mohali, Punjab
content: Mohali district, also known as Ajitgarh district and officially known as Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar district or SAS Nagar district , is one of the twenty two districts of Punjab a state in north-west India. title: Top Places to visit in Rupnagar, Punjab
content: Rupnagar district is one of twenty-two districts in the state of Punjab, India. The town of Rupnagar (formerly known as Rupar or Ropar) is said to have been founded by a Raja called Rokeshar, who ruled during the 11th century and named it after his son Rup Sen. title: Top Places to visit in Pathankot, Punjab
content:
Pathankot district, is a district of Indian Punjab, located in the north zone of the state. Pathankot city is the district headquarters. The district was created on 27 July 2011.

title: Top Places to visit in Sri Muktsar Sahib, Punjab
content: Sri Muktsar Sahib district, colloquially known by the city's former name Mukstar; is one of the twenty two districts in the Indian state of Punjab. title: Top Places to visit in Moga, Punjab
content: Moga district is one of the twenty two districts in the state of Punjab, India. It became the 17th district of Punjab State on 24 November 1995 cut from Faridkot district. title: Top Places to visit in Mansa, Punjab
content: Mansa district falls under the Indian state of Punjab. The headquarters is Mansa city. Mansa district was formed on 13 April 1992 from the erst while district of Bathinda. title: Top Places to visit in Ludhiana, Punjab
content: Ludhiana District is one of the 22 districts in the state of Punjab in northwest India. It is the largest district of Punjab, by both area and population. title: Top Places to visit in Kapurthala, Punjab
content: Kapurthala is a city in Punjab state of India. It is the administrative headquarters of Kapurthala District.
